flawed_nl_solution:
The second day Richard walks 20/2-6 = <<20/2-6=4>>4 miles.
Richard walks 20+4+10 = <<20+4+10=43>>43 total miles.
Richard has 70-43 = <<70-43=27>>27 miles further to walk to be in New York City.
#### 27

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 34, not 43. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
